sense.gloss: to consider as, to regard (as equivalent), to deem (as), to equate
it may be my imagination, but ..., I may be imagining things, but ...
to speak as though something were actually the case, to smooth over, to give the impression that, to make it sound that
to hear (something) as, to think that (something) sounds like

r_ele.r: みなしかせつじゅうたく

sense.gloss: to be convinced (that), to be under the impression (that), to assume

sdata.j: ↑罪↑↓つみ↓を↑赦↑↓ゆる↓された↑者↑↓もの↓、↑清↑↓きよ↓い↑者↑↓もの↓として↑見↑↓みる↓做して↑下↑↓くだ↓さって、↑天国↑↓てんごく↓への↑道↑↓みち↓を↑歩↑↓あゆ↓めるようにして↑下↑↓くだ↓さるのです。
sdata.e: Those whose sins are forgiven are deemed to be sinless that they may find the way to heaven.
